thread.title: Turkey's Erdogan says will not buy foreign defence systems except in emergency

title: Turkey's Erdogan says will not buy foreign defence systems except in emergency
text:
February 6, 2018 / 9:26 AM / Updated an hour ago Turkey's Erdogan says will not buy foreign defence systems except in emergency Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
ANKARA (Reuters) - Turkey will not buy defence systems, software or products from abroad except in emergency, President Tayyip Erdogan said on Tuesday, vowing to develop domestic military designs and systems. 
Speaking at a meeting of his ruling AK Party in parliament, Erdogan said Turkey was ready to cooperate with foreign defence firms that accepted Ankaraâ€™s conditions, but that this would not lead to purchases of ready-made systems. Reporting by Tuvan Gumrukcu and Ece Toksabay; Editing by Dominic Evans
